post.body: but when has there ever been a good time? it seems that I've been hearing warnings of a bad economy--like always!
was just on your website. I heard about I Heart Daily http://www.iheartdaily.com/ congrats!
ur welcome. @cheerfulgivers looks like a good organization..
yummy, toast and tea, haven't had that since I started drinking herbal tea.
and I do it all at once. Right now I'm co-writing a novel & magazine work...I have a grant on the horizon. I do it all at once
I'm VERY multi-faceted. I write confessions, novels, grants, self help articles, parenting articles, feature stories...
Also in a sense I am working on th book--writing self help is my life's work. I publish something every week on the topic.
Les Brown says to do things before you are ready, but I believe you should not stress ur body if you don't have to...
so what I do is work on a number of projects, a little bit, slowly move things along. Unless I have a deadline, there's no rush.
as it turned out I did have tomorrow and the next day and the next. LOL...so I don't get like that anymore about books.
We also watched HG Wells "Time Machine" this year. LOL. Prompted all sorts of discussions.
We're watching th Sarah Connor Chronicles where people/cyborgs R being sent back in time, but what if you could be sent forward?
What if time isn't linear ie in a Twilight Zone eposide. Husb corrected me saying time was linear in that eppy, but parallel.
LOL. there ws no conclusion. Sum believe u choose ur parents B4 birth, so I said "what if u could also chose th time of ur birth
Oh I don't remember the one with the dentist, I remember the one where the wife shot lawyer husband and gf in bed.
Those women deep down inside didn't want that one man, they were competing with each other most likely.
What FIGHTING over a man? Those women need to read Robyn Norwood's Women Who Love Too Much.
Reverend Run talks alot about the joy that can be found IN family. we need to learn how to get joy from what we have.
what causes indecision is lack of confidence and a sense of conviction, fear of making a mistake etc.
one day when i've been married for 50 yrs & give advice I'll talk about maturity. At some point you hav 2 choose ONE pers.
But it took me a looooooooong time to choose one....
monogamy is the answer I believe, other variations of relationships get 2 complicated. But it is hard 2 choose sumtimes.
The nicest people in the world who want 2 do right can get caught up in more than one relationship--at the same time.
The thing is I had to choose between two I was seeing at th SAME time B4 I got married, wouldn't say I was a playa, but...
Last night after the children were in bed, my hub and I had a deep & meaningful convo @ whether or not parallel universes exist.
A romantic evening is anything without having to rush home to the chldren. LOL. I really enjoy long discussions with my hubby..
no sumone who doesn't work is a different story. LOL. NO deadbeats. LOL
Actually I don't necessarily think once a playa, always a playa, the important thing is 2 pick sumone w/a conscience.
he usually chooses to bake.
ANY recipe (as long as it's vegetarian) even if we have 2 go 2 th ends of the earth and it takes a week 2 collect th ingredients
My 10 year old can use the stove under supervision. He likes to cook so we encourage him. Twice a month I say that we'll make...
I know Tivo and Netflix have decreased my desire to go to the theater. But I'm not big on seeing first run movies, I can wait.
yeah with th size of some TV screens, surround sound etc, why would anyone go to theatre if they can see a first run at home?
Do you think people would still go to the movies if they could get the movie at home?
No dragging a stroller up and down the steps on the train. Woooo hoooo. Conversation at dinner--no crying and screaming...YAY
how old are your boys? Mine are wonderfully 8 and 10. No diaper bag...whoooohooo...no concern about changing diapers in public!
feeling pretty good today. How are you?
greetings!!
Question: when u think @ ur happiness, do you think @ sources of happiness in th past or do you focus on what u have not yet experienced?
Also I turn 40 in less than 13 months, I want 2 think @ what I've done with my life. Less frenetic goal attainment, more quiet reflection.
So 2 things for '09--no more major new projects, I still have to put to bed new exciting projects from '03. '04, '05 etc and more savoring.
I tend 2 focus on th future, thinking sumthng I haven't experienced will make me happy. In '09, I'll reflect & savor past accomplishments.
Question: when u think @ ur happiness, do you think @ sources of happiness in th past or do you focus on what u have not yet experienced?
Read this article http://tinyurl.com/6jtfkm. It's about "I Heart Daily" newsletter.
okay just finished working on a child dev articled called "The Fantastic First Year" and edited another on Early Intervention.
RT@myklroventine nonprofit (I'm on the board) providing b-day gift bags 2 kids in poverty, on Twitter. Plse follow @cheerfulgivers. Thnks.
guess who I'm following now on Twitter, none other than @MCHammer. "...let's get it started..." that's all I remember from the song. LOL.
Most of my self help articles are on bellaonline http://www.bellaonline.com/site/lifecoaching
need to get busy, BUT only after I tear myself from utube, will visit my soaps website 4 a sec. In fact I'll do both at th same time. hehe
"ay arriba, ay arriba...Ay, arriba arriba...Por ti sere, por ti sere, por ti sere....la la bamba...." oh brings back memories!
RT@tedmurphy Wondering how long it will be before all movies are released at home the same time as theatres.
RT@commonsense4@chrispirillo "WARNING! There's a phishing scam running rampant on Twitter: http://tinyurl.com/9rmfy6 (expand) - NOTE!
not ONE person-not ONE said, "oh wait until they're older...ur REALLY going 2 enjoy ur older children, ur teens & ur adult children."
Ok, when I had my son in one of those front carriers when he was like 4 mos pple would say "oh enjoy it, babies are the best!" No one...
Last week on Friday we went bowling and to a vegetarian restaurant....
games at Virgin Record store, Toys R U etc, but there were NO tantrums, no unpleasantness, no stroller. We had a great time!
Last night we went out to Times Square. B4 we left we told the children (8 and 10) that we were just sight seeing. They looked at video
Going out with my toddler and newborn or my two toddlers was HORRIBLE. Something 2 B tolerated. Now I have a great time with my kids.
Anyone else out there feel that children 8 and up are a million times easier to deal with than newborns? We go out 2 dinner now and it's fun
Cooking dinner 4 children &reading FUNNY book "Tales from the Crib" about the trials and tribulations of having a new baby. I can relate.
